I have a same issue.
I tried to implement WGAN-GP [arXiv: 1704.00028] using `nn.LSTM` for G and D, and it worked on CPU but on CUDA it did not work with the following error.
`RuntimeError: CudnnRNNLegacyBackward is not differentiable twice`
I hope that this problem will be solved.
